subject: Horse Racing
Jockeys, Drivers and Trainers
lead_paragraph: Pierrot Lunaire, a 48-1 shot, held off Spy in the Sky by a nose to win the $150,000 Lonesome Glory Steeplechase at Belmont Park.
snippet: Pierrot Lunaire, a 48-1 shot, held off Spy in the Sky by a nose to win the $150,000 Lonesome Glory Steeplechase at Belmont Park.
